item.title: The TomTom City portal offers real-time traffic and travel updates
item.description: TomTom (TOM2) introduces TomTom City, a digital platform providing real-time traffic data and travel details to both individuals and traffic management professionals. This new service showcases the wide array of traffic information available for specific cities and acts as a hub for connecting traffic authorities, businesses, and citizens to collaborate on sustainable and efficient mobility solutions. Building on the traffic information already available through TomTom navigation devices and partners in automotive, consumer, and government sectors, TomTom City expands upon the historical congestion data provided in reports like the TomTom Traffic Index.
